content.desc: These are the open source libraries we use to make this forum:

section.first_section_desc: DeepL Translator to translate your texts with the best machine translation available, powered by DeepL's world-leading neural network technology.
section.second_section_desc: Bootstrap is a free and open-source CSS framework directed at responsive, mobile-first front-end web development. It contains CSS- and (optionally) JavaScript-based design templates for typography, forms, buttons, navigation, and other interface components.
section.third_section_desc: MongoDB is a general purpose, document-based, distributed database built for modern application developers and for the cloud era.
section.fourth_section_desc: nodemon is a tool that helps develop node.js based applications by automatically restarting the node application when file changes in the directory are detected.
section.fifth_section_desc: Express is a minimal and flexible Node.js web application framework that provides a robust set of features for web and mobile applications.
section.sixth_section_desc: Mongoose is a MongoDB object modeling tool designed to work in an asynchronous environment. Mongoose supports both promises and callbacks.
section.seventh_section_desc: Lingua is a middleware for the Express.js framework that helps you to internationalise your webapp easily. It determines the language of the user agent and pushes the i18n resources to your views.

section.first_section_desc: Preview our Discord server through the Widget
section.second_section_desc: Hi My Name Is RealPenguin im the owner of a discord server name Club Jerry And the creator this forum :)
